Name: Risen
About the game: The island Faranga needs a new hero, you! Delve into a gritty, raw and atmospheric fantasy world in which every action has a consequence. In the epic world of Risen, filled with mysterious earthquakes, fearsome monsters and unimaginable treasures, forge your path with the sword, learn the art of staff fighting or become a powerful mage. Countless side quests and creatures to discover. Over 60 hours of Immersive open world gameplay. Alter the destiny of the island by the actions you take.
